Module com.marinescu.fxmoney
Package com.marinescu.fxmoney.Model

Class PDFHolder

java.lang.Object
com.marinescu.fxmoney.Model.PDFHolder
All Implemented Interfaces:
LoanInterface, ShowBalance
public class PDFHolder extends Object implements ShowBalance, LoanInterface
This class creates a PDF with detailed information about a loan.
